props.activator: Designate a custom activator when the `activator` slot is not used. String can be any valid querySelector and Object can be any valid Node.
props.allowOverflow: Removes overflow re-positioning for the content.
props.arrow: The arrow modifier positions an inner element of the popper so it appears centered relative to the reference element, usually the triangle or caret that points toward the reference element.
props.attach: Specifies which DOM element that this component should detach to.
props.bottom: Aligns the component towards the bottom.
props.boxClass: Applies a custom class to popper wrapper.
props.closeOnClick: Designates if menu should close on outside-activator click.
props.closeOnContentClick: Designates if menu should close when its content is clicked.
props.contentClass: Applies a custom class to content wrapper.
props.distance: Displaces the popper away from, or toward, the reference element in the direction of its placement. A positive number displaces it further away, while a negative number lets it overlap the reference.
props.eager: Will force the components content to render on mounted.
props.left: Aligns the component towards the left.
props.maxHeight: Sets the maximum height for the content.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the content.
props.minHeight: Sets the minimum height for the content.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the content.
props.modelValue: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
props.openOnClick: Designates whether menu should open on activator click.
props.openOnFocus: Designates whether menu should open on activator focus.
props.openOnHover: Designates whether menu should open on activator hover.
props.origin: Sets the transition origin on the element.
props.placement: Describes the preferred placement of the [popper](https://popper.js.org/docs/v2/constructors/#options).
props.right: Aligns the component towards the right.
props.skidding: Displaces the popper along the reference element.
props.tag: Specifies a custom tag for the activator wrapper.
props.top: Aligns the content towards the top.
props.transition: Sets the component transition. Can be string name of transition or object with [custom transition classes](https://v3.vuejs.org/guide/transitions-enterleave.html#custom-transition-classes).
props.width: Width of the content. Value `100%` setting width of menu eq. to activator width (uses `sameWith` popper modifier).
props.zIndex: The z-index used for the component.

emits.update:modelValue: Emitted when the model value updated.

slots.activator: When used, will activate the component when clicked (or hover for specific components).
